bibl.title: Yu.N. LITVINENKO i A. MARCONE, "Mongol privetstvuet Sirijca": perepiska M.I. Rostovceva i F. Cumont. Avec résumé en anglais: "Mongolus Syrio salutem optimam dat". Correspondence between M.I. Rostovtzeff and F. Cumont.
bibl.note: 4 letters by M.I.R. and 4 letters by F.C. (archive of Academia Belgica, Rome, and archive of Duke University, Durham), 1927-1939. One of the main topics is the excavation at Dura-Europos.
bibl.seg: BONGARD-LEVIN G.M., C. BONNET, Yu.N. LITVINENKO i A. MARCONE, "Mongol privetstvuet Sirijca": perepiska M.I. Rostovceva i F. Cumont. Avec résumé en anglais: "Mongolus Syrio salutem optimam dat". Correspondence between M.I. Rostovtzeff and F. Cumont.
4 letters by M.I.R. and 4 letters by F.C. (archive of Academia Belgica, Rome, and archive of Duke University, Durham), 1927-1939. One of the main topics is the excavation at Dura-Europos.
